synopsis:
Official video for いけず "ikezu" (Mean) by Otoboke Beaver おとぼけビ〜バ〜 from their latest single "Love Is Short!!" Directed and edited by renowned animation director and character designer Naoyuki Asano (Mr. Osomatsu).
"Ikezu": Dialect of the Kansai region. Definition: malicious; ill-tempered; unkind​; odious; hateful​; hooligan; ruffian; villain; scoundrel; wrongdoer; wicked person; a bad person.
